full_text: FedEx Adjustment Request FAX TO (800) 548-3020 Invoice Number: 4-494-31285 Invoice Date: Nov 25, 2002 Account Number: 1144-2081-6 Page: 2 of 6 Tracking No./Airbill No. Reason Code Explanation BEFORE YOU FAX Please include detailed explanation for each adjustment request. Remember to include recipient's account number or third party's account number if applicable.
